title: Broadcom's shopping around
text:
Broadcom's shopping around Tuesday, March 13, 2018 - 01:23 
Broadcom will most likely look for its next acquisition target after U.S. President Donald Trump blocked its $117 billion bid for Qualcomm on national security grounds, say analysts. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Broadcom will most likely look for its next acquisition target after U.S. President Donald Trump blocked its $117 billion bid for Qualcomm on national security grounds, say analysts.
